message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $12,500. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  $12,500 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm interested in the product but I can only go up to $9,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,500 represents the true value of this product, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
Alice, thanks for the offer.  I appreciate you coming down, but $11,000 is still too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $9,500.  This is my best offer. What do you think?
